thread.title: Bologna confirm fit-again Godfred Donsah ready for Palermo clash on Sunday
thread.title_full: Bologna confirm fit-again Godfred Donsah ready for Palermo clash on Sunday

title: Bologna confirm fit-again Godfred Donsah ready for Palermo clash on Sunday
text:
13:40 CET Bologna confirm fit-again Godfred Donsah ready for Palermo clash on Sunday - www.ghanasoccernet.com Godfred Donsah in training at Bologna. 
Bologna have confirmed fit-again Godfred Donsah is in line to play against Palermo this Sunday after returning to training. 
The Ghana international trained with the group for Wednesday's double workouts at the Casteldebole, the club confirmed on its website on Wednesday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
